name: Pickly Survival: Shield of Protection
description:
Storyline: 

Welcome to a world, a game of your imagination, explore the vast world, and save the princess your dying to marry, locked up in her castle up far in Far Land. Travel with your companion, Pickly, as you explore the vast lands, fight enemies, and run free with the friendly enemies... but, something awaits you, on your journey. The Journey Must Endure. . . 

[END of Storyline] 

Spooky right, you might wanna play, well go ahead press that green flag. 

Controls and Support:

Sprint - Move keys with space (TIP: Running into a wall depletes all energy) 

Moving - WASD, Arrow Keys 

Space - Spawn Friendly Enemies 

E - Interact

Q - Drop

Click - Place SEB (Sharp Edge Bomb)

R - Shoot

GO TO https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/31536636/ for OLDER versions!
